thread.title: roel lim-a-po
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by roel lim-a-po

author: roel lim-a-po
title: roel lim-a-po
text: i have too say that the last 2 years i had a very good support of vacation rental villas in finding a suitable accomodation at avery nice ressort ,and all according to what is offered in the voucher.it all start with a very helpfull person on the phone who guides you through the whole booking wirhin 10 minutes.within 2days you go through the whole procedure from signing the agreement till the cofirmation.when you arrive on the first day off your stay the people off the office on frt myers beach are very friendly and helpfull too give you a quick handling off the keys.when you enter the rented appartment it looks excactly as subscribed.and during your stay they several times ask you if anything else is required to make your stay pleasant and comfortable.thats why i can recommend doing bussiness with this company
